parameters.name: DbId
parameters.description:
The database ID. You can call the [ListDatabases](~~141873~~) operation to query the ID of a physical database and the [ListLogicDatabases](~~141874~~) operation to query the ID of a logical database.

>  The value of DatabaseId is that of DbId.

parameters.name: Logic
parameters.description:
Specifies whether the database is a logical database. Valid values:

*   true: Logical database.
*   false: Physical database.

parameters.name: PermissionType
parameters.description:
The type of the permission to be verified.

Valid values:

*   QUERY
*   EXPORT
*   CORRECT
*   LOGIN
*   PERF

parameters.name: Tid
parameters.description:
The ID of the tenant.

>  View Tenant ID by hovering over your profile icon in the DMS console. For more information, see the [View information about the current tenant](~~181330~~) section of the "Manage DMS tenants" topic.
